logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Major rework of treemap reports. Now supports both interactive and static versions.

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Added a new concept called report that operated much like a plugin but does not resave the panopticode.xml file when it is done. Changed existing reports from plugins to reports. Started restructuring build files.

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Moved plugin running from PanopticodeDoclet to PluginRunner

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Completed first cut of being able to load the project data structure from XML. This pointed out a bug in the emma plugin where it attached a method coverage metric to the method

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Updated sample panopticode.xml

logentry.msg: Factored out some duplication

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Changed treemaps to dynamically get the list of metrics to display details for. Still much work to do to clean this up

logentry.msg: factored out a bit of duplication

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Fixed problem with treemap javascript in IE and updated sample graphs

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Added the ability to click on a rectangle in treemaps and get the details under the legend. This is only tested in Firefox and IE and is known to be broken in IE.

logentry.author: jrshaw
logentry.msg: Added output file from running JHawk against the Java Precisely code. This is to be used for future JHawk plugin development.
